TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract sealed beforefieldinit PixelFormats extends System.Object
public ref class PixelFormats abstract sealed

summary.span: 表示受支持像素格式的集合。

span.span: Represents the collection of supported pixel formats.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr101010 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr101010 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。
是具有 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每个颜色通道（蓝色、绿色和红色通道）都分配了 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 10 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Bgr24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。
是具有 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每个颜色通道（蓝色、绿色和红色通道）都分配了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式使用每个像素24位的数据 ( [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]对于这三种基本色中的每种颜色, 均为 8)。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] for each of the three primary colors blue, green, and red). 这将转换为每种主要颜色 256, 为每个图像提供高达16000000的颜色。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 若要显示图像, 监视器和控制器必须能够显示至少32000颜色。To display images, the monitor and controller must be capable of displaying at least 32,000 colors. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

每个颜色通道（蓝色、绿色和红色通道）都分配了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgr565 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。
是具有 16 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每个颜色通道（蓝色、绿色和红色通道）都分别分配了 5、6 和 5 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (blue, green, and red) is allocated 5, 6, and 5 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] respectively.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Bgra32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

每个通道（蓝色、绿色、红色和 alpha 通道）都分配了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each channel (blue, green, red, and alpha) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property BlackWhite As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat BlackWhite { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取黑白像素格式，该格式将每像素的一位数据显示为黑色或白色。

span.span: Gets the black and white pixel format which displays one bit of data per pixel as either black or white.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Cmyk32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Cmyk32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式，它可显示 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]，每个颜色通道（青色、洋红色、黄色和黑色通道）分配 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] with each color channel (cyan, magenta, yellow, and black) allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks CMYK 颜色系统通常用于纸张打印墨迹。The CMYK color system is often used in printing inks for paper. 此类型的颜色表示形式的格式为 cmyk (C%, M%, Y%, K%), 其中 C、M、Y 和 K 是颜色的青色、洋红色、黄色和黑色值的百分比值。This type of color representation is of the form cmyk (C%, M%, Y%, K%), where C, M, Y, and K are the percent values for the cyan, magenta, yellow, and black values of the color. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Default As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Default { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取最适合于特定操作的像素格式。

span.span: Gets the pixel format that is best suited for the particular operation.
The best suited for the particular operation.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 从技术上说, 它不是一种像素格式, 而是一种方法, 用于访问最适合特定操作的像素格式。 is technically not a pixel format but rather a way to access the pixel format best suited for a particular operation. 此格式用于特定像素格式不重要的情况。This format is used for situations where the specific pixel format is not important. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Gray16 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray16 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式，它可显示每像素 16 位的灰度通道，允许使用 65536 种灰色底纹。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays a 16 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 65536 shades of gray.

summary.span: 此像素格式的 gamma 值为 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray2 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式，它可显示每像素 2 位的灰度通道，允许使用 4 种灰色底纹。

span.span: Gets the pixel format which displays a 2 bits-per-pixel grayscale channel, allowing 4 shades of gray.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray32Float { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

可显示允许 40 亿种以上灰色底纹的 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 灰度通道。

span.span: displays a 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] grayscale channel, allowing over 4 billion shades of gray.

summary.span: 此像素格式的 gamma 值为 1.0。

span.span: This format has a gamma of 1.0.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Gray8 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式，它可显示每像素 8 位的灰度通道，允许使用 256 种灰色底纹。

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Indexed1 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Indexed1 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取像素格式，它指定具有 2 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

value.span: 一种像素格式，它指定具有 2 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 2 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板图像使用颜色表来确定图像的颜色使用情况。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 图像中的每个像素都映射到表或调色板中的特定颜色。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 调色板中的每种颜色都由其索引号或值标识, 其对应于表中的位置。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 该像素格式的表中有2种颜色。The pixel format has 2 colors available in the table. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Indexed2 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Indexed2 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取像素格式，它指定具有 4 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: Gets the pixel format specifying a paletted bitmap with 4 colors.

value.span: 一种像素格式，它指定具有 4 种颜色的调色板位图。

span.span: The pixel format which specifying a paletted bitmap with 4 colors.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板图像使用颜色表来确定图像的颜色使用情况。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 图像中的每个像素都映射到表或调色板中的特定颜色。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 调色板中的每种颜色都由其索引号或值标识, 其对应于表中的位置。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 该像素格式的表中有4种可用颜色。The pixel format has 4 colors available in the table. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 调色板图像使用颜色表来确定图像的颜色使用情况。Paletted images use a color table which determines the color usage for the image. 图像中的每个像素都映射到表或调色板中的特定颜色。Each pixel in the image is mapped to a particular color in the table, or palette. 调色板中的每种颜色都由其索引号或值标识, 其对应于表中的位置。Each color in the palette is identified by its index number, or value, which corresponds to its position in the table. 在表中, 像素格式具有256颜色。The pixel format has 256 colors available in the table. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Pbgra32 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Pbgra32 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。
是具有 32 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每个通道（蓝色、绿色、红色和 alpha 通道）都分配了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each channel (blue, green, red, and alpha) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

summary.span: 每个颜色通道都预先乘以 alpha 值。

span.span: Each color channel is pre-multiplied by the alpha value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared ReadOnly Property Rgb24 As PixelFormat
public: static property System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat Rgb24 { System::Windows::Media::PixelFormat get(); };

summary.span: 获取 像素格式。
是具有 24 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)] 的 sRGB 格式。
每个颜色通道（红色、绿色和蓝色通道）都分配了 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)]。

span.span: Each color channel (red, green, and blue) is allocated 8 [!INCLUDE[tla#tla_bpp](~/includes/tlasharptla-bpp-md.md)].

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此格式使用每个像素24位的数据 (三个基本色、绿色和蓝色的每个像素每像素8位)。This format uses 24 bits of data per pixel (8 bits per pixel for each of the three primary colors red, green, and blue). 这将转换为每种主要颜色 256, 为每个图像提供高达16000000的颜色。This translates to 256 shades of each primary color to provide up to 16 million colors for each image. 图像与图像相同, 但颜色通道 (红色、绿色和蓝色通道) 的顺序不同。 An image is the same as a image, but the color channels (red, green, and blue) are in a different order. ## XAML 属性用法XAML Attribute Usage ```
